Title: Relates to establishing a child care and early childhood education innovation program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a child care and early childhood education innovation program and fund to award grants to increase the economic viability and sustainability of child care businesses; makes an appropriation.
LawCode: Add ยง410-bbb, Soc Serv L; add ยง99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the child care and early childhood education innovation program; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the child care and early childhood education innovation fund; and making an appropriation therefor
